contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox musical artist | name = Zook | image = Zook_live_at_Virgin_Oil_12th_of_June_2006.jpg | caption = l-r: Rocka Merilahti, Bryn Jones, Sami Kuoppamäki, Jukka Jylli | image_size = 250 | background = group_or_band | origin = [[Helsinki]], [[Finland]] | genre = [[Blues Rock]]<br>[[Rock music|Rock]] | years_active = 2003–present | label = [[Kuru Records]] | website = http://www.zookzone.net | current_members = [[Bryn Jones]] <br />[[Rocka Merilahti]]<br />[[Jukka Jylli]]<br>[[Sami Kuoppamäki]] }} '''Zook''' is a [[Finland|Finnish]] [[Rock music|rock]] band based in [[Helsinki, Finland]]. Their debut album, ''[[Root Canal Recovery]]'', was released in January 2006. It charted at number 27 on the Finnish Top-40 charts.<ref>[http://www.yle.fi/lista/listat/albumit.php?id=2577 YLE - Albums: Week 03/2006 {{fi icon}}]</ref> Two of the band's members, [[Jukka Jylli]] and [[Sami Kuoppamäki]] were formerly members in the well-known [[progressive rock|progressive]]/[[psychedelic rock]] band [[Kingston Wall]]. Rocka Merilahti has played in [[Hurriganes]]' [[Remu Aaltonen]]'s and [[Hanoi Rocks]]' [[Michael Monroe]]'s solo bands.<ref>[http://meteli.net/uutiset/2190 Meteli - Ikämiehet juurevan rockin äärellä {{fi icon}}]</ref> Zook toured Finland from March 2, 2006 to April 29, 2006.<ref>[http://nyt.hs.fi/musiikki/artikkeli/1135218960890 Helsingin Sanomat - Zook singahtaa kevätkiertueelle {{fi icon}}]</ref><ref>[http://www.mtv3.fi/viihde/uutiset/musiikki.shtml/428128?zook MTV3 - Zook kevätkiertueelle {{fi icon}}]</ref> ==Discography== *''Chemistry'' (single, 2005) *''Root Canal Recovery'' (2006) ==References== <references /> {{DEFAULTSORT:Zook}} [[Category:Finnish musical groups]] [[Category:Musical groups from Helsinki]] {{Finland-band-stub}}
